text: Juan Pelayo Ayala CÃ¡ceres (born 1942) is a Paraguayan footballer. He played in five games for the Paraguay national football team in 1963. He was also the member of Paraguay's squad for the 1963 South American Championship. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Paraguayan footballers Category:Association football forwards
